author: Andy Chalk
description: Hypixel Studios says Steam is a "great marketing tool" but not one it necessarily needs.
title: Hytale won't be on Steam when it launches into early access: Developers want to focus on the game, not 'on negative reviews from players that aren't as well-informed yet about what we are doing'

author: Andy Chalk
description: This is the second round of layoffs at the Embracer-owned studio this year.
title: Eidos Montreal lays off more employees, internal projects reportedly cancelled as the studio shifts focus to support work

author: Issy van der Velde
description: 25 games we're hyped about and a whole load of new reveals.
title: Every game, trailer, and announcement in the 2025 PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted

description: We travel to Seattle to speak to the team working on The Council's Most Wanted upcoming game.
title: 'Everything is bigger' in Slay the Spire 2, which has been crowned our Most Wanted game

author: Katie Wickens
description: Who's a pretty boy, then?
title: Capture the heart of hectic sea battles in upcoming pirate themed survival crafting adventure, Windrose

description: Tucked into a PCGS montage is another sneak peek at this wild game.
title: Your chance to wreak havoc as an inseparable demon-infant duo is closing in with twin-stick action adventure game Damon and Baby

description: Yeah, this is about as wild as real dreams are.
title: Delightfully weird dream logic RPG Away From Home is out this week

author: Katie Wickens
description: Become an occult detective and puzzle your way through the unknown.
title: This first look at Inkblood is giving me the heebie-jeebies, but in a jaunty, dark carnivalesque way

description: Splitgate: Arena Reloaded ditches the hero shooter trappings later this month.
title: Splitgate 2 is dead, long live Splitgate: Arena Reloaded—the shooter's back-to-the-basics relaunch is coming December 17

description: Warning, the clues fight back.

description: Buckle up for an emotional rollercoaster in this atmospheric adventure game.

description: A farming sim with a DIY focus.
title: Starsand Island makes me want to quit my job and move to the coast with its adorable new trailer

description: Hack and slash to your hearts content.
title: Regions of Ruin: Runegate just dropped a new trailer and I'm about to pledge myself to the Dwarven king, no questions asked

description: Free your imagination
title: Craft a cornucopia of unique spells in 3D side-scrolling puzzle adventure Rhell: Warped Worlds & Troubled Times

description: Lead your wingmates to victory.
title: Flight sim strategy game Remnant Protocol is set to release in March

description: Oh neat, another character creator I'll lose countless hours to!

description: Reform submerged fragments of an uncomfortable mystery.

description: Now verified for Steam Deck.
title: Now's the time to relive classic MMO Guild Wars, which just got a big 'Reforged' overhaul

description: I can now sleep easy.

description: I'm not so sure.

description: No guesses as to what customer all this money is really for.

description: "I don't believe that I'm an avatar. I believe The Ghoul exists in the world."
